title: Feet of Clay
description: This is an alternate cover edition of ASINB01L7RO1DQ.My name is Frank Butcher, and evidently when you save the world, it comes back for seconds.After I stopped a world ending apocalypse, my allies tried to cut open my chest with an axe. Kind of messed up, if you ask me.Thankfully, I've got a chance to return the favor. And I'm going to take it. Not because they're trying to magically reshape the natural laws that govern our planet. No, I'm doing this because trying to cut out my heart is not okay.
author: J.A. Cipriano
